summary: Adds the \"Dovahkiin\" from Bethesda\'s trailers as a companion. Fus Ro Dah!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/fvdblw.png[/IMG]
                                [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/f53j0l.png[/IMG]

*****************************************************************



                        DOVAHKIIN COMPANION                      
                            Version 1.1



*****************************************************************

Index:
1. Mod Description
2. Installation Guide
3. Bugfixes

*****************************************************************

     1. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

 - This mod adds the \"Dovahkiin\" from Bethesda\'s trailers as a companion.
   He is located at The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Meet him there then ask
   him to follow you.

 DOVAHKIIN\'S APPARELL

 - Steel Sword
 
 - Studded Cuirass
 - Iron Boots
 - Iron Helmet
 - Iron Gauntlets
 - Banded Iron Shield

 INFO

 - Dovahkiin has the ability to use Thu\'um (Shouts). 
   Currently he only knows \"Unrelenting Force\". There is also a cooldown time (10 seconds)

 - He mostly uses his Steel Sword, but sometimes he equips his Bow, for example when dragons appear.

 - He can be equipped all kinds of armor and weapons. (If the rating is higher)

 - He  is essential (Can\'t die)

*****************************************************************

     2. Installation Guide

*****************************************************************

 - The 1.1 update let\'s you choose between three different level packs
   
   1. The Puny Pack     - The lowest level pack (Level 10). For players that has just started their adventure.
   2. The Mediocre Pack - The regular level pack (Level 30). For players that are far into the game.
   3. The Tank Pack     - The strongest level pack (Level 81). For players that are 100 in all skills and 1 hit KO most enemies. (Using this pack early in the game on a low difficulty makes the game                           too easy and it will basically count as cheating!)

 
 - Extract the desired \"Data\" folder into your main Skyrim directory (Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)
 
 - Start the Skyrim Launcher, go to Data Files and check your desired pack. (DO NOT CHOOSE MORE THAN ONE PACK!)

 - Ready to go!


 LOCATION

 - Dovahkiin can currently be found in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

*****************************************************************

     3. Bugfixes

*****************************************************************

 - Update 1.1 - Dovahkiin\'s stats didn\'t seem to increase at all, no matter which level you was in. This bug was fixed by adding the three level packs.




*****************************************************************
*****************************************************************

 - This is my first Skyrim mod, so I would be happy If you could leave a response or future wishes for this mod in the comment section. :)

 
 Bendik
author: Bendik
